items.sentence: People who break their promises can\'t be trusted.
Platypuses aren\'t the only mammals that lay eggs.
I saw you and Tom yelling at each other yesterday.
You don\'t have to pay attention to what Tom says.
There is nothing like the smell of roasted coffee.
Many people study Japanese so they can read manga.
I don\'t want to hear another complaint about you.
We\'ve done something similar to that in the past.
We\'ve got less than three hours to get this done.
Wealth isn\'t as important as health or happiness.
